properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Planting trees

Replanting bamboo species around the water source

Vegetative cover improving around the water source with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and pla

properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Paving available stone in the river banks and Planting trees

Marking Reservation

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm )-Along the river banks

Vegetative cover improving around the water source with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m

properties.Descriptio: Gonna Gahawela canal at 13th mile post
properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal, some places Constructed of rectangular concrete lining(300mm x 300mm)     Water from this canal is used to grow  Vegetable and paddy on an area of about 6 acres.
properties.Descript_1:
Construction of Rectangular Concrete Canal

Site preparation & setting out

Earth excavation for foundation or quarry  materials and haul the surplus materials up to  30m by Manually.

Plywood form work including making, fixing & remo
